metadata.name: A Beautiful Blue Day
metadata.description:
Floral scent is so soothing, isn’t it?
This is my self-portrait painting from when I was among the beautiful baby blue eyes flowers at Hitachi Seaside Park in Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan.

Alone but not lonely in one of the most beautiful days as I’m embraced by the nature.

Hope my painting makes your day a beautiful one, too. ^_^

- Tucko PariPari -
